code: export var getTodos=function getTodos(){return fetch("/api/todos").then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var createTodo=function createTodo(todo){return fetch("api/todo/create",{method:"POST",headers:{"Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)});};export var updateTodo=function updateTodo(todo,id){return fetch("/api/todo/".concat(id),{method:"POST",headers:{"Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(todo)});};export var getTodo=function getTodo(id){return fetch("/api/todo/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return res.json();});};
